wikitext.*:
{{year-header}}
==January==
* '''[[January 12|12]]''' - Actress [[Cynthia Addai-Robinson]] is born.
==March==
* '''?''' - ''[[J.R.R. Tolkien's Letters to Rhona Beare]]'' is published.
* '''?''' -  Gary Gygax publishes the essay "''[[The influence of J.R.R. Tolkien on the D&D and AD&D games]]''" in ''Dragon'' magazine.

==April==
* '''[[25 April|25]]''' - ''[[A Path from Rome|A Path from Rome: An Autobiography]]'', which includes a [[Index:Reminiscences of J.R.R. Tolkien|reminiscence of J.R.R. Tolkien]], is published.
* '''?''' - [[Mallorn 22|''Mallorn'' 22]] is published.

==May==
* '''?''' - ''[[Masterpieces of Terror and the Supernatural]]'', including [[J.R.R. Tolkien]]'s [[Riddles in the Dark#First Edition|first edition of ''Riddles in the Dark'']], is published.
* '''?''' - [[Beyond Bree May 1985|''Beyond Bree'' May 1985]], including [[J.R.R. Tolkien]]'s '[[Concerning ... 'The Hoard']] and [[Kinship of the Half-elven]], is published.
==June==
* '''[[24 June|24]]''' - Actor [[Valentine Dyall]] dies.
* '''?''' - [[Beyond Bree June 1985|''Beyond Bree'' June 1985]], including [[J.R.R. Tolkien]]'s '[[Kinship of the Half-elven]]', is published.
==July==
* '''[[17 July|17]] - [[Robert Havard]], [[Inklings|Inkling]], dies.
* '''[[26 July|26]]-[[29 July|29]]''' - [[Mythcon 16]].
* '''?''' - ''[[Some Light on Middle-earth]]'' is published.

==August==
* '''[[22 August|22]] - ''[[The Lays of Beleriand]]'' is published in the UK.'''
* '''[[29 August|29]]''' - Actor [[Patrick Barr]] dies.

==September==
* '''[[27 September|27]]-[[29 September|29]]''' - [[Oxonmoot 1985]].
==October==
* '''?''' - [[Beyond Bree October 1985|''Beyond Bree'' October 1985]] is published.
==November==
* '''[[20 November|20]]''' - ''[[The Lays of Beleriand]]'' is published in the US.
==December==
* '''[[December 5|5]]''' - Artist [[Matěj Čadil]] is born.
==?==
* '''?''' - [[The Tolkien Trust]] gives ''[[The End of Bovadium]]'' to the [[Bodleian Library]].
* '''?''' - [[The Hobbit (1985 television film)]] is released in the Soviet Union
* '''?''' - [[James Dundas-Grant]], Inkling, dies.
* '''?''' - Author [[Alan Bliss]] dies.
* '''?''' - The [[Polish Tolkien Society]] is founded.
* '''?''' - [[Melbourne House]] publishes ''[[Lord of the Rings: Game One]]''
* '''?''' - ''[[Riders of Rohan (1985 book)]]'' is published.
* '''?''' - ''[[Thieves of Tharbad]]'' is published.
* '''?''' - ''[[Erech and the Paths of the Dead]]'' is published.
* '''?''' - ''[[Goblin-gate and Eagle's Eyrie]]'' is published.
* '''?''' - ''[[Haunted Ruins of the Dunlendings]]'' is published.
* '''?''' - [[Grenadier Models Inc.]] releases metal miniatures for [[Iron Crown Enterprises|ICE]]'s [[Middle-earth Role Playing|MERP]].
* '''?''' - [[Inklings Calendar 1986]] released.
* '''?''' - [[The 1986 Tolkien Calendar]] released.
* '''?''' - [[The Hobbit Calendar 1986]] released.
* '''?''' - [[The 1986 J.R.R. Tolkien Calendar]] released.
* '''?''' - [[Beyond Bree 1986 Tolkien Calendar]] released.
